attributes.comment:
This proposed fee increase would substantially raise the amount of money it costs to
adopt a child from another country. There are hundreds of thousands of children
worldwide waiting to be adopted. This increase would mean that more children have to
wait longer for loving homes and many people simply could not afford it due to this
increase. It is already costing me over $20,000. to adopt a child from another counrty.
This increase is huge !!! Please reconsider the increase or at least the outragous
amount of increase.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Gaylynn Clevenger
